title: LET'S GO ENGINEERING!! 🎉
content: Get ready for an amazing semester ahead! The Computer Engineering department welcomes all new and returning students. Let's build the future together with innovation and passion! 🚀 #CPE2024

title: Hackathon 2024: Register Now! ⚔️
content: Calling all code warriors! Our annual Hackathon is back this December. Form your teams and show off your problem-solving skills to win amazing prizes. 🏆 Registration closes on November 15th. Don’t miss out!

title: Machine Learning Workshop 🤖
content: Join us for a hands-on workshop on Machine Learning and AI. Learn how to build models and integrate them into real-world applications. 🌍 Open to all Computer Engineering students. Sign up by October 20th!

title: Project Showcase: Seniors Edition 🌟
content: Witness the incredible final projects from our graduating seniors! From autonomous robots to innovative IoT solutions, our students will blow your mind with their creativity and technical skills. 💡 Don’t forget to drop by the Engineering Auditorium on October 25th.

title: CPE Sports Fest: Register for E-Games! 🎮
content: Whether you're a fan of Valorant, DOTA, or Mobile Legends, we’ve got a tournament for you! Form your squads and register now for the Computer Engineering E-Games tournament as part of the annual CPE Sports Fest. 🏅

title: Scholarship Program: Apply Today 🎓
content: Need financial assistance? Our department is offering a limited number of scholarships for deserving students. 📝 Applications are open until November 1st. Make sure you meet the GPA requirements and submit all necessary documents.

title: Internship Opportunities 🌐
content: Are you looking for hands-on experience in the industry? We have partnered with top tech companies for internship programs this summer. Apply by the end of October and boost your career before you graduate! 📈

title: Alumni Talk: Innovators in Tech 💬
content: Come and learn from some of our successful alumni working at top companies like Google, Apple, and Microsoft. They’ll share their experiences and give advice on how to succeed in the tech industry. 📅 Join us on October 30th, 3 PM in the main hall.

title: Cybersecurity Awareness Month 🔒
content: October is Cybersecurity Awareness Month! Stay tuned for our series of webinars and workshops where you’ll learn about the latest trends and how to protect yourself from cyber threats. All sessions are free! 💻

title: Call for Volunteers: Robotics Competition 🤝
content: Want to get involved in something exciting? We are looking for volunteers to help organize and run the National Robotics Competition this November. A great opportunity to network and build your skills! 🤖
